無雪: (むせつ) - disappearance of snow (i.e. due to melting); lack of snow (i.e. snow not falling)
無音検出: (むおんけんしゅつ) - silence detection
無響室: (むきょうしつ) - anechoic chamber; anechoic room
無頼: (ぶらい) - hoodlum/scoundrel/ruffian/tough/villain; villainy; without relying on others/without asking for help
無題: (むだい) - untitled; titleless; without a title; no subject (email)
無額面株: (むがくめんかぶ) - no-par stock; no-par-value stock
無額面株式: (むがくめんかぶしき) - no-par stock; no-par-value stock
無顎類: (むがくるい) - agnathans (jawless fishes of superclass Agnatha)
無類力士: (むるいりきし) - {sumo} wrestler of grand champion quality but without the title
無風帯: (むふうたい) - calm belt or zone
無風流: (ぶふうりゅう) - lack of refinement; inelegance; want of artistic taste; lack of poetic sense
無駄: (muda) - futilidade, desperdício, inutilidade, falta de sentido, ócio
無駄にしない: (むだにしない) - make good use of; make the most of
無駄にする: (むだにする) - to render futile; to bring to naught; to waste; to not make good use of
無駄になる: (むだになる) - to come to nothing; to be in vain; to lead nowhere
無駄に成る: (むだになる) - to come to nothing; to be in vain; to lead nowhere
無駄を省く: (むだをはぶく) - to eliminate waste
無駄使い: (むだづかい) - wasting ... on (e.g. money); squandering; waste; frittering away
無駄口をたたく: (むだぐちをたたく) - to chatter pointlessly; to waste one's breath
無駄口を叩く: (むだぐちをたたく) - to chatter pointlessly; to waste one's breath
無駄花: (むだばな) - blossom which fails to produce fruit; non-fruit-bearing flower
無駄話: (むだばなし) - gossip; idle talk; chat
無駄足: (むだあし) - visit for no reason; go on fool's errand
無駄足を踏む: (むだあしをふむ) - to go on a fool's errand; to go in vain
無駄遣い: (mudazukai) - waste (de dinheiro, tempo, etc.), squandering, frittering away
無駄食い: (むだぐい) - eating between meals; living idly
無駄骨: (むだぼね) - useless; waste of time and effort; pointless; vain efforts
無駄骨を折る: (むだぼねをおる) - to waste one's efforts; to work to no (useful) effect
無駄骨折り: (むだぼねおり) - laboring in vain or for no result; labouring in vain
無骨: (ぶこつ) - boorish; unrefined; rustic; uncouth; clumsy; brusque
無骨一徹: (ぶこついってつ) - (yoji) rustic; boorish; uncouth; adamantly sticking to being boorish
焦がし: (こがし) - flour made from parched rice or barley (can be mixed in hot water and drunk)
焦がす: (こがす) - to burn; to scorch; to singe; to char
焦がれる: (こがれる) - to yearn for; to be in love with
焦がれ死に: (こがれじに) - pining away; dying from love
焦げ: (こげ) - scorch/burn/scorching; burnt rice; part of ceramic glaze that has become dark or darkish-brown during firing
焦げつく: (こげつく) - to get burned and stuck on (e.g. rice in a pan); to become uncollectable (e.g. debt or loan)/to become irrecoverable; to remain unchanged (e.g. stock market)
焦げる: (こげる) - to burn; to be burned
焦げ付く: (こげつく) - to get burned and stuck on (e.g. rice in a pan); to become uncollectable (e.g. debt or loan)/to become irrecoverable; to remain unchanged (e.g. stock market)
焦げ目: (こげめ) - burn mark; grilled surface (e.g. on a steak)
焦げ茶: (こげちゃ) - dark brown; olive brown
焦げ茶色: (こげちゃいろ) - dark brown; olive brown
焦らす: (じらす) - to tease; to peeve; to play cat and mouse with; to keep (someone) in suspense; to irritate
焦らずに: (あせらずに) - stay calm; don't be rushed; don't be flustered
焦る: (aseru) - estar com pressa, estar impaciente, estar nervoso, perder a calma, ficar surpreso
焦れる: (じれる) - to get impatient; to become irritated; to fret; to chafe
焦土戦術: (しょうどせんじゅつ) - scorched-earth strategy (tactics)
焦心苦慮: (しょうしんくりょ) - (yoji) worrying oneself (about); being anxious (about); fidgeting (about)
焦性硫酸: (しょうせいりゅうさん) - pyrosulphuric acid; pyrosulfuric acid
焦点が合う: (しょうてんがあう) - to be in focus; to come into focus
焦点をあてる: (しょうてんをあてる) - to focus (on)
焦点を当てる: (しょうてんをあてる) - to focus (on)
焦点を絞る: (しょうてんをしぼる) - to narrow the focus; to focus attention (on); to concentrate (on); to zero in
焦点ガラス: (しょうてんガラス) - focusing screen
焦点深度: (しょうてんしんど) - depth of focus
焦点距離: (しょうてんきょり) - focal length (distance)
焦熱地獄: (しょうねつじごく) - (yoji) burning hell; inferno
焦眉の急: (しょうびのきゅう) - urgent need
焦臭い: (きなくさい) - burning or scorched smell; imminent military action; suspicious
焦躁: (しょうそう) - impatience; uneasiness; irritation; fretfulness
然う: (そう) - in that way (concerning the actions of the listener or concerning the ideas expressed or understood by the listener; with a neg. sentence, implies that something isn't as much as one might think)/thus/such; so (used to express agreement with something said); so? (used to express some doubt with something said)
然うすれば: (そうすれば) - if so; in that case; in that situation
然うとも: (そうとも) - exactly right!; indeed; damn straight
然うは問屋が卸さない: (そうはとんやがおろさない) - things don't work that well in the real world; things seldom go as one wishes; that is expecting too much; it won't be that easy
